pkgmetadata.longdescription: Technology Appraisal Toolbox for Health Economic Evaluations in the Netherlands // Functions to support economic modelling in R based on the methods of the Dutch guideline for economic evaluations in healthcare https://www.zorginstituutnederland.nl /publicaties/publicatie/2024/01/16/richtlijn-voor-het- uitvoeren-van-economische-evaluaties-in-de-gezondheidszorg, CBS data https://www.cbs.nl/, and OECD data https://www.oecd.org/en.html.
